Author: lasirenexx
Text: It’s unlikely that you’d gain actual fat on 1200 calories, but if you’ve been restricting heavily, your body will likely hold onto water weight as it relearns how to process more food.   Once you’ve decided to maintain, perhaps check out [reverse dieting](https://aaptiv.com/magazine/reverse-dieting) to up your calories to maintenance level without gaining.

Author: 3cats_in_atrenchcoat
Text: Every body is Different! 1200 is pretty low to gain for almost any body. How many calories you would have to eat to gain weight depends on your height, current weight and activity level.
